valsi.definition: sumti place tag: tag 1st sumti place.
location tense relation/direction; arriving at/directly towards ...
fatne modal, 1st place backwards; reverse of ...
$g_1$ inverts/reverses/turns over $f_1$ into $f_3$.
unary mathematical operator: reciprocal; multiplicative inverse; [1/a].
$g_1$ reveals to $f_1$ $f_2$ (du'u) about subject/object $f_3$
unconditional end of text; outside regular grammar; used for computer input.
$x_1$ is the terminator of structure originated by selma'o $x_2$ in language $x_3$.
non-logical connective: respectively; unmixed ordered distributed association.
$x_{1}$ discovers/finds out $x_{2}$ (du'u) about subject/object $x_{3}$; $x_{1}$ finds (fi) $x_{3}$ (object).
$x_{1}$ [member] is ordinary/common/typical/usual in property $x_{2}$ (ka) among members of $x_{3}$ (set).
valsi.notes: Also: $x_2$ is a normal/common/ordinary/typical property among set $x_3$ (= selterfadni for reordered places); also regular, (mabla forms:) banal, trite, vulgar; ($x_3$ is complete set). See also {cafne}, {rirci}, {kampu}, {lakne}, {tcaci}, {cnano}.

valsi.definition: $x_1$ is Tuesday of week $x_2$ on calendar $x_3$.
$x_1$ is firethorn of species/variety $x_2$.
$j_1$ is a fender/firescreen for a fireplace using fuel $f_2$ burning-in/reacting-with oxidizer $f_3$.
$f_1$=$c_1$ is a volcano projecting from land mass $c_2$.
$x_{1}$ is a fire/flame in fuel $x_{2}$ burning-in/reacting-with oxidizer $x_{3}$ (default air/oxygen).
$r_1$ kindles $f_2$ in atmosphere $f_3$ under conditions $r_3$
$x_1$ is a tool for starting fire $x_2$. $x_1$ is a lighter such as for cigarettes.
$c_1$ is a flamingo of species $c_2$.
$x_1=fe_1$ is the ashes of $x_3=fa_2$, combusted by fire $x_2=fa_1$.
$s_1$ is/appears to be of ash color/hue as perceived/seen by $x_2=s_3$ under conditions $x_3=s_4$.
$k_1$ is a spark of fire $x_2=f_1$.
$g_1$ extinguishes/puts out fire $x_2=s_1=f_1$.
$x_1$ is a quantity of/contains/is made of charcoal from source $x_2$
$x_1=g_3$ is a torch illuminating $g_2$ with fuel $x_3=f_2$ reacting with oxydizer $x_4=f_3$ (default air/oxygen).
$z_1$ is a fireplace/hearth for fuel $f_2$ burning in/reacting with oxidizer $f_3$ (default air/oxygen).
sumti place tag: tag a sumti moved out of numbered place structure; used in modal conversions.
Fido.
$b_1$ distributes $b_2$ to $b_3$ from $b_4$ over path $b_5$. $b_1$ is a distributor.
$c_1$ is/are a/the function/activities involving persons $c_2 $ distributing $f_1$ among/to $f_2$; $c_1$ is distribution
valsi.notes: C.f. {fatri}, {cuntu}, {selvensro}, {terzbasro}, {vencu'u}, {zbacu'u}, {dintrocu'u}, {dinveicu'u}. In a company, this may be referred to as logistics or channel management.

valsi.definition: $x_1$ = $g_1$ [person/agent] distributes/allots/allocates/shares $x_2$ =$f_1$ among $x_3$ = $f_2$ with shares/portions $x_4$ =$f_3$.
$s_1$ is a socialist ideology as applied by $t_1$ in/among people/territory/domain $t_2=f_2$ based on the works of thinker $s_3$
$p_1=f1$ is/are the profit/dividends shared/distributed from the earnings of company/corporation/firm $p_2$ among $f_2$ with shares/portions $f_3$.
$x_1=l_1=f_1$ explores fact $x_3=f_2$ about $x_2=l_2=f_3$ using instrument $x_4=l_3$
$b_1$ is a parachute of type/material $b_2$.
$c_1$ (agent) drops $f_1$ to $f_2$ from $f_3$.
$g_1$ makes $f_1$ fall.
$x_1$ is a falcon (genus 'falco').
$x_{1}$ is a sail for gathering propelling material $x_{2}$ on vehicle/motor $x_{3}$.
$x_1$ is the factorial of $x_2$.
$c_1$ (agent) concludes by expressing/saying $c_2=f_1$ for/to audience $c_3$ via expressive medium $c_4$ concluding $f_2$.
$x_{1}$ is an aunt/uncle of $x_{2}$ by bond/tie $x_{3}$; $x_{1}$ is an associated member of $x_{2}$'s parent's generation.
$c_1$ is a terminator of class/part-of-speech $c_2$ in language $c_3$.
$b_1$ is canvas of material $b_2$.
$x_{1}$ is a function/single-valued mapping from domain $x_{2}$ to range $x_{3}$ defined by expression/rule $x_{4}$.
$x_{1}$ is alien/foreign/[exotic]/unfamiliar to $x_{2}$ in property $x_{3}$ (ka).
$t_1$=$d_1$=$f_1$ is a windsurfingboard of material/property $t_2$.
valsi.notes: From {tanbo}, {djacu}, {falnu} (f2, f3 subsumed). See also sufingboard (={bonjacta'o}), kitesurfingboard (={volfanjacta'o}), wakesurfingboard (={blobonjacta'o}).

valsi.definition: $k_1$ sails to destination $k_2$ from origin $k_3$ via route $k_4$ on sailing vehicle $k_5=f_3$.
$x_{1}$ is an end/finish/termination of thing/process $x_{2}$; [not necessarily implying completeness].
valsi.notes: $x_1$ is final/last/at the last; $x_1$ is a terminal/terminus of $x_2$; $x_1$ is the final/terminated state of terminated process $x_2$; $x_2$ terminates/ceases/stops/halts at $x_1$ (= selfa'o for reordered places). See also {krasi}, {cfari}, {mulno}, {sisti}, {denpa}, {jipno}, {kojna}, {traji}, {krasi}.

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ is a factory/foundry/industrial plant/mill producing $x_{2}$ from materials $x_{3}$.
$g_1$ is a/the manufacturing industry/sector, manufacturing/processing $g_2=f_2$ at factories/plants $f_1$ from materials $f_3$ using process $g_3$
$p_1$ is an industrial park managed by community/polity/company $p_2$ for factories/plants producing $f_2$.
$x_{1}$ prevents/keeps/stops/restrains/constrains event $x_{2}$ from occurring.
$x_{1}$ translates text/utterance $x_{2}$ to language $x_{3}$ from language $x_{4}$ with translation result $x_{5}$.
$x_{1}$ (event) annoys/irritates/bothers/distracts $x_{2}$.
valsi.notes: Also: is disruptive to. See also {fengu}, {raktu}, {dicra}, {tunta}, {zunti}, {jicla}.

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ opposes/balances/contends against opponent(s) $x_{2}$ (person/force ind./mass) about $x_{3}$ (abstract).
$c_1$ gets lost on the way to $f_2$ (object/event) in/near $f_3=c_3$
$x_1$=$d_1$ is the opposite direction from $x_3$=$f_3$ that $x_2$=$f_2$ is.
$g_1=f_3$ aims at $f_1$ with $f_2$ (object/event).
valsi.notes: $x_3$ can be $x_1$ itself or an extra object/event such as "weapon", "effort", etc. Cf. {farna}.

valsi.definition: $j_1$ shows the direction of $f_2$ (object/event) to audience $j_3$ from origin/in frame of reference $f_3$
$x_{1}$ falls/drops to $x_{2}$ from $x_{3}$ in gravity well/frame of reference $x_{4}$.
valsi.notes: Note: things can fall in spin, thrust, or tide as well as gravity; (agentive "drop" = one of two lujvo: falcru and falri'a). See also {lafti}, {cpare}, {klama}, {sfubu}.

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ is the direction of $x_{2}$ (object/event) from origin/in frame of reference $x_{3}$.
valsi.notes: $x_2$ is towards $x_1$ from $x_3$ (= selfa'a for reordered places). See also {zunle}, {pritu}, {galtu}, {gapru}, {cnita}, {dizlo}, {berti}, {snanu}, {stuna}, {stici}, {purci}, {balvi}, {lidne}.

valsi.definition: $s_1=f_3$ non-agentively/inanimately points at/directionally indicates $s_2=f_2$ to observer $s_3$ as being in the direction $f_1$.
valsi.notes: Direction (i.e. $x_4$) is relative to the $x_1$ place. Cf. {farja'o}, {degja'o}.

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ develops/evolves towards/into $x_{2}$ from $x_{3}$ through stages $x_{4}$.
$s_1=f_1$ reflects Breton culture/language in aspect $s_2=f_2$.
$x_{1}$ (event) is an event that happens/occurs/takes place; $x_{1}$ is an incident/happening/occurrence.
valsi.notes: (cf. cmavo list fau, krefu, lifri, fatci, rapli; gasnu, zukte, if specifically agentive, banli)

valsi.definition: $v_1$ is a verb meaning $v_2$ in language $v_3$.
$f_1=b_1$ is the French language used by $b_2$ to express/communicate $b_3$ (si'o/du'u, not quote).
$g_1=f_1$ is the country of France.
$x_{1}$ (du'u) is a fact/reality/truth/actuality, in the absolute.
$f_1 = k_1$ [sequence] is able to be / capable of being reversed from / into sequence $f_2$ by event $k_2$ under conditions $k_3$ (event / state).
$x_{1}$ [sequence] is in reverse order from $x_{2}$ [sequence]; $x_{1}$ (object) is inverted from $x_{2}$ (object).
valsi.notes: Also opposite (one sense). See also cmavo list {fa'e}, {dukti}.

valsi.definition: $s_1$ implodes into pieces/energy/fragments $s_2$.
$x_{1}$ is distributed/allotted/allocated/shared among $x_{2}$ with shares/portions $x_{3}$; ($x_{2}$/$x_{3}$ fa'u).
valsi.notes: Also spread, shared out, apportioned; agentive distribution (= {fairgau}, {fairzu'e}). See also cmavo list {fa'u}, {fendi}, {preja}, {katna}, {tcana}.

valsi.definition: $x_1$ (me'o) is the p-adic representation of number $x_2$ in base $x_3$.
valsi.notes: can be infinitely long to the left but not the right; for repeating p-adics ({krefu} fatysaclu) use {ra'e} before {pi}

valsi.definition: fasnu modal, 1st place (non-causal) in the event of ...
$f_1$ is an event that has time/temporal duration $t_1$ ranging from starting time/event $t_2$ to ending time/event $t_3$.
$g_1$ develops $f_1$ into $f_2$ from $f_3$ through stages $f_4$.
$t_1$ is a developmental / evolutionary stage / state of $t_2 = f_1$ in its development towards / into $f_2$ from $f_3$ through stages $f_4$.
valsi.notes: First place is intended for things like software version numbers. See also {favytcinymupli} (which is how you talk about actual things that have a version associated with them). Made from {farvi} + {tcini}.

valsi.definition: $m_1$ is an example/instance of developmental/evolutionary stage/state $m_2=t_1$ of developing thing $t_2=f_1$ in its development towards/into $f_2$ from $f_3$ through stages $f_4=m_3$.
valsi.notes: Someone causing the development is neither implied nor denied; hence this word can be used both for Darwinian evolution and software development. Made from {favytcini} + {mupli}.

valsi.definition: $t_1$ chatters/gossips to $t_2=f_2$ about subject $t_3$ in language $t_4$.
sumti place tag: tag 2nd sumti place.
binary mathematical operator: nth root of; inverse power [a to the 1/b power].
mark space interval distributive aspects; labels interval tense modifiers as location-oriented.
location event contour tense: perfective in space; beyond the place of ...
location event contour tense: continuative in space; throughout the place of ...
location event contour tense: initiative in space; on this edge of ...
location event contour tense: achievative in space; at the point of ...
location event contour tense: completive in space; at the far end of ...
location tense interval modifier: never in space; objectively quantified tense.
location event contour tense: anticipative in space; up to the edge of ...
location tense interval modifier: always in space; objectively quantified tense.
location event contour tense: superfective in space; continuing too far beyond ...
n-ary mathematical operator: divided by; division operator; [(((a / b) / c) / ...)].
vocative: over and out (end discussion).
elidable terminator: end nonce conversion of selbri to modal; usually elidable.
$c_1=f_1$ growls/snarls/roars c2 [non-linguistic utterence] in anger at $f_2$ for $f_3$ (action/state/property).
$g_1$ (person/agent) boils $x_2=f_1$ at temperature $x_3=f_2$ and pressure $x_4=f_3$.
valsi.notes: Note that this means simply to evaporate a liquid; to cook something by boiling is {febjukpa}. Also c.f. {jukpa}, {djacu}, {ladru}, {cidja}, {patxu}.

valsi.definition: $x_1=j_1$ cooks/prepares food-for-eating $x_2=j_2$ by sitting it in boiling liquid $x_3=f_1$ at temperature $x_4=f_2$ and pressure $x_5=f_3$
$x_{1}$ boils/evaporates at temperature $x_{2}$ and pressure $x_{3}$.
$b_1=f_1$ roars/snarls/growls angrily atterance $b_2$ at $f_2$ because of $f_3$ (action/state/property).
$m_1=f_1$ is irritated/[mildly angry] at $f_2$ for $f_3$ (action/state/property).
$m_1=f_1=b_1$ grumbles with sound $b_2$ at $f_2$ because of $f_3$ (action/state/property).
valsi.notes: jvajvo definition; Gismu deep structure is "milxe le ka fengu kei gi'e bacru"

valsi.definition: $r_1$ (event) angers $f_1$.
$f_1=c_1$ is without anger/mild/meek regarding $f_2$ for $f_3$ (action/state/property).
digit/number: hex digit B (decimal 11) [eleven].
$x_1$ is November/eleventh month of year $x_2$ in calendar $x_3$.
valsi.notes: Note: Based on experimental rafsi for {fei} (fel). Use with caution. Alternative: {pavypavma'i}

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ is $10^{-15}$ of $x_{2}$ in dimension/aspect $x_{3}$ (default is units).
$x_{1}$ (agent) divides/partitions/separates $x_{2}$ into sections/parts/ind. $x_{3}$ by method/partition $x_{4}$.
$m_1$ is a sewing pattern of forms $m_2$ according to structure $m_3$.
$x_{1}$ is angry/mad at $x_{2}$ for $x_{3}$ (action/state/property).
$x_{1}$ (action/event) is crazy/insane/mad/frantic/in a frenzy (one sense) by standard $x_{2}$.
$x_{1}$ is a crack/fissure/pass/cleft/ravine/chasm/[defect/flaw] [shape/form] in $x_{2}$.
$x_{1}$ sews/stitches/sutures materials $x_{2}$ (ind./set) together with tool(s) $x_{3}$, using filament $x_{4}$.
valsi.notes: ($x_2$ if a set must be a complete specification); See also {cilta}, {jivbu}, {jorne}, {nivji}, {pijne}, {lasna}.

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ is measured in kopeck/cent money-subunits as $x_{2}$ [quantity], in monetary system $x_{3}$.
valsi.notes: Also pfennig, paisa, sen, fen, dinar, etc.; $x_1$ is generally a price/cost/value. (additional secondary, tertiary, etc. subunit places may be added as $x_4$, $x_5$, $x_6$, ...); See also {sicni}, {jdini}, {jdima}, {vecnu}, {rupnu}, {dekpu}, {gutci}, {minli}, {merli}, {bunda}, {kramu}.

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ is a/the lung [body-part] of $x_{2}$; [metaphor: breathing/respiratory apparatus/bellows].
$s_1$ is a cent coin issued by $s_2$ in monetary system $f_3$.
$x_{1}$ is fertile/conducive for supporting the growth/development of $x_{2}$; $x_{1}$ is fruitful/prolific.
valsi.notes: Also fecund (note that the Lojban covers both potential and actual/realized fertility). See also {vanbi}, {sidju}, {rorci}, {farvi}, {banro}, {cange}.

valsi.definition: $x_1$ is Virgo [constellation/astrological sign].
valsi.notes: From {ferti}. The Greeks and Romans associated Virgo with their goddess of wheat, Demeter-Ceres who is the mother of Proserpina-Persephone. For this reason the constellation became associated with fertility (in both Babylonia, Greece and Rome). Alternatively, she was sometimes identified as the virgin goddess Iustitia or Astraea, holding the scales of justice in her hand as the constellation Libra. Since ferti in lojban covers both potential and actual/realized fertility, the original meaning of the constellation have been chosen, but you could probably still interpret the name in both senses (as a deity of fecundity or as a fertile virgin).

valsi.definition: $x_1=f_2=c_1$ abandons / forsakes / leaves behind $x_2=f_1=c_2$
$x_{1}$(s) is/are waste product(s) [left to waste] by $x_{2}$ (event/activity).
valsi.notes: Also shit, crap; agentive wasting (= {fesygau}, {fesyzu'e}). See also {xaksu}, {kalci}, {pinca}.

valsi.definition: $x_1=g_1$ [person/agent] leaves waste product/wastes $x_2=f_1$ by event/activity $x_3=f_2=g_2$
$c_1$ is a goddess of people(s)/religion $c_2$ with dominion over $c_3$ [sphere].
$c_1$ is gynophilous/bisexual/straight male/lesbian in situation $c_2$ by standard $c_4$.
valsi.notes: This word is only about sexual interest in females; other sexual interests are irrelevant. Cf. {nakcinse}, {fetfetcinse}, {mitcinse}, {dutcinse}.

valsi.definition: $c_1=f_1$ is female and gynophilous/gay/bisexual in situation $c_2$ by standard $c_4$
valsi.notes: This word is about female homosexuality and bisexuality. See also {fetcinse}, {naknakcinse}, {mitcinse}, {relcinse}.

valsi.definition: $f_1=n_1$ is an unmarried woman under law/custom/tradition $s_3$.
$p_1$ is the clitoris of $p_2$.
$x_{1}$ is a female/doe of species $x_{2}$ evidencing feminine trait(s) $x_{3}$ (ka); $x_{1}$ is feminine.
$x_1$ is a wife of $x_2$ (spouse) according to marriage tradition/custom/law $x_3$.
$t_1$ is a matriarch of people/territory/domain/subjects $t_2$.
$x_1$ is an ovary of $x_2$.
sumti place tag: tag 3rd sumti place.
sumti place tag: place structure number/tag question.
finti modal, 1st place (creator) created by ...
$c_1$ is a fish-eater of fish species $f_2$.
vocative: hospitality - inhospitality; you are welcome/ make yourself at home.
$x_{1}$ takes a fika [social institution]/coffee break together with $x_{2}$ consuming food/beverage $x_{3}$.
valsi.notes: From the swedish word "fika". Both "fika" and "fi'ikca" are also derived from the word for coffee in respectively language (kaffi respectively {ckafi}). fi'ikca describes the event where you socialize with others, perhaps over a cup of coffee. In a swedish context x2 might often be friends or fellow workers, and x3 usually is coffee/squash/(tea) together with a cinnamon roll, cookie, cake, a sandwich etc. But fi'ikca could also be used in a more universal, cultural neutral sense. See also http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fika_%28coffee_break%29

valsi.definition: vocative: hospitality - inhospitality.
convert selbri to nonce modal/sumti tag.
copyrights attribution
valsi.notes: used to mark the preceding term as being copyrighted. The copyright is attributed to the sumti inside the DOI

valsi.definition: $xr_1$ is a guineafowl of species/breed $xr_2$
digit/number: fraction slash; default "/n" =RefEntity "gt" 1/n, "n/" =RefEntity "gt" n/1, or "/" alone =RefEntity "gt" golden ratio.
half.
$g_1$ [person/agent] confuses $c_1$ (event/state) for $c_2$ [observer] due to [confusing] property $c_3$ (ka).
$b_1$ becomes different/changes/transforms from $f_2$ in property/dimension/quantity $f_3$ under conditions $b_3$.
$x_{1}$ is a fig [fruit/tree] of species/strain $x_{2}$.
$cu_1=cf_1$ is a fictional book about plot/theme/subject $cf_1$ by author $cu_3=cf_3$ for audience $cu_4$ preserved in medium $cu_5$.
$x_1$ is a fern of family/genus/species $x_2$.
$g_1$ [person/agent] causes $f_1$ to be easy for $f_2$ under condition(s) $f_3$.
$z_1=f_1$ (action) is easier than $z_2$ (action) for $x_3=f_2$ (agent) by amount $z_4$ under conditions $x_5=f_3$.
$r_1$ [event/state] causes $f_1$ to be easy for $f_2$ under condition(s) $f_3$.
$s_1$=$f_1$ is simple/easy in property $s_2$ for $f_2$ under conditions $f_3$
$g_2=f_1$ is apparent to $g_1$ via perceptual/cognitive faculty $g_3$.
valsi.notes: x3 includes reason or critical thinking skills as well as discrete biological organs such as eyes or ears. Cf. {frili}, {sapselga'e}, {sampu}, {klina}.

valsi.definition: $f_{1}$=$sj_{1}$ (du'u) is an easy to understand/clear fact/truth to $f_{2}$=$sj_2$ about subject $sj_{3}$ under conditions $f_{4}$.
$x1=j2$ is meek/[easily controlled by] $x2=f2=j1$ in activity $x3=j3$ under conditions $x4=f3$
$s_1$ is easily understood/interpreted as the meaning of $s_2$ by (agent) $s_3$=$f_2$ under conditions $f_3$.
valsi.notes: From {frili}+{smuni}. The $x_1$ of {frili} is subsumed into the overall sense of the word. See also: {filseljmi}, {klina}.

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ reflects Palestinian culture/nationality in aspect $x_{2}$.
$t_1=f_2$ speaks fluently to $t_2$ about subject $t_3$ in language $t_4$ under conditions $f_3$.
$fr_1=fi_1$ dedicates invention/creation/composition/work $fr_2=fi_2$ to $fr_3$ with conditions $fr_4$.
$x_{1}$ is a fish of species $x_{2}$ [metaphorical extension to sharks, non-fish aquatic vertebrates].
$x_1$ is a trout of species/breed $x_2$
$x_1$ is a candir√∫ of species/variety $x_2$.
$x_1$ is a halibut of species $x_2$.
$x_{1}$ invents/creates/composes/authors $x_{2}$ for function/purpose $x_{3}$ from existing elements/ideas $x_{4}$.
valsi.notes: $x_1$ is creative/inventive. See also cmavo list {fi'e}, {ciska}, {pemci}, {zbasu}, {larcu}, specific works of authorship, {prosa}, {skina}.

valsi.definition: $x_1$ is an aspect of / a part of The Force connecting / within $x_2$
valsi.notes: No attempt at good fu'ivla making was harmed in the creation of this word.

valsi.definition: $c_1$ is a fish farm at $c_2$, farmed by $c_3$, raising/producing fish species $x_4=f_2$.
$fi_1$ is a gill of fish $fe_2=fi_1$ of species $x_3=fi_2$.
valsi.notes: See also {fipybirka}, {fipyrebla} for other fish-body related words.

valsi.definition: $x_1$ fishes for fish species $x_2$.
$x_1$ is March of year $x_2$ in calendar $x_3$.
$x_1$ is stick-shaped fish meat [a fishstick] of fish type/species $x_2$
$b_1$ is a fin of fish $x_2=f_1$ of species $x_3=f_2$.
$g_1$ is a/the fisheries industry/sector producing fish products $g_2$ from fish species $f_2$ by process $g_3$
$r_1$ is the tail fin of fish $r_2=f_1$ of species $x_3=f_2$.
$x1=fl2=fr1$ has look/[facial expression] $x2=fl1=fr2$ to stimulus $x3=fr3$ under condition $x4=fr4$
$g_1$ is a mask covering the face of $g_2=f_2$.
$k_1$ is the beard/moustace/facial hair of $f_2=k_2$.
$p_1$ is a silhouette of $f_1$ made by $p_3$ in medium $p_4$.
$x_1$ rejects $x_2$ (offer, suggestion, proposal) from $x_3$.
$x_1$ accepts $x_2$ (an offer/suggestion) from $x_3$.
$c_1=f_3$ [lacks law]/[is lawless with regard to] law(s) $f_1$ specifying $f_2$ (state/event) under conditions $f_4$ by lawgiver(s) $f_5$; $c_1=f_3$ is lawless.
$g_1=t_1$ is the Lower House/House of Representatives/House of Commons for territory $t_2$ with members $g_3=f_5$.
$x_{1}$ is a law specifying $x_{2}$ (state/event) for community $x_{3}$ under conditions $x_{4}$ by lawgiver(s) $x_{5}$.
valsi.notes: $x_1$ is a legality; $x_2$ is legal/licit/legalized/a legality (= selfla for reordered places). See also {javni}, {ritli}, {zekri}, {pulji}, {tinbe}.

valsi.definition: $t_1$ is an outlaw not following the law $t_2$ made by $t_3$.
$x_{1}$ is a flute/pipe/fife/recorder [flute-like/air-reed musical instrument].
$x_1$ is a dizi.
$z_1$ is a judicial court administering lawsuit $p_2=f_2$ for community $f_3$.
$fa_1$ rebels against/opposes law $fl_1$, which specifies $fl_2$ (state/event) for community $fl_3$ under conditions $fl_4$ by lawgiver(s) $fl_5$.
$r_1=f_5$ enacts $r_2=f_1$ (law/legislation/treaties/act) for community $f_3$ under condition $r_3=f_4$.
$g_2$ is a/are citizen(s) of country $g_1$ according to law $f_1$ specifying $f_2$ (state/event) for community $f_3$.
$x_1$ is Fluttershy from My Little Pony
$c_1=t_1=f_5$ is the legislative branch of the government of people/territory/domain/subjects $t_2$.
$x_1$ is a plum of variety $x_2$.
$x_1$ is a/are legal resident(s) of location/country $x_2$ according to law $f_1$ specifying $f_2$ (state/event) for community $f_3$.
$g_1=t_1$ is the Upper House/Senate/House of Lords for territory $t_2$ with members $g_3=f_5=z_3$.
$c_1$ pours/intensely rains to $c_2$ from $c_3$.
$x_{1}$ is a current/flow/river of/in $x_{2}$ flowing in direction to/towards $x_{3}$ from direction/source $x_{4}$.
valsi.notes: [$x_1$ is a stream of $x_2$; $x_2$ is a fluid Gas or liquid. (= {selfle} for reordered places); $x_1$ flushes toward $x_3$; flush (= {caifle}, {sukfle})]; See also {rirxe}, {senta} where no directionality is implied, {rinci}, {xampo}, {dikca}, {sakci}, {gapci}, {litki}, {ciblu}.

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ fails at doing $x_{2}$ (state/event); $x_{1}$ is a failure at its role in $x_{2}$.
valsi.notes: Baffled (= {pesfli}, {jmifli}, {dafspufli}, {menfli}, among other senses); also $x_2$ ceases/does not complete/fails to continue due to failure on the part of $x_1$. See also {cfila}, {snada}, {srera}, {troci}, {sisti}, {ranji}, {denpa}, {bebna}, {zunti}.

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ is a/the face [head/body-part] of $x_{2}$; (adjective:) $x_{1}$ is facial.
$x_1$ bounces $x_2$ back to $x_3$ from $x_4$ because of failure $x_5$.
$x_1=z_1=f_1$ does $x_2=z_2$ to achieve goal $x_3=z_3=f_2$ which $x_1$ fails to achieve.
$b_1=f_1$ is an iceberg floating on $f_2$ (water, sea etc.).
$x_1$ is a flounder of species $x_2$.
sumti place tag: tag 4th sumti place.
pro-sumti: he/she/it/they #6 (specified by goi).
pro-sumti: he/she/it/they #7 (specified by goi).
pro-sumti: he/she/it/they #8 (specified by goi).
pro-sumti: he/she/it/they #9 (specified by goi).
pro-sumti: he/she/it/they #10 (specified by goi).
terminator: end composite lerfu; never elidable.
$x_{1}$ is a field [shape/form] of material $x_{2}$; $x_{1}$ is a broad uniform expanse of $x_{2}$.
valsi.notes: Also woods (= {ricfoi}), lawn/meadow (= {sasfoi}), brush (= {spafoi}, {cicyspafoi}). See also {purdi}, {cange}.

valsi.definition: $x_1$ is a pangolin of species/breed $x_2$.
$x_1$ is foamless/unleavened.
$c_1$ is a quantity/contains Swiss cheese/cheese with holes from source $c_2$.
$s_1$ is a bubble of material $f_2$ filled with $f_3$.
$v_1$ is made of/contains/is a quantity of sparkling wine from fruit/grapes $v_2$.
$x_1$ is yeast of species $x_2$ growing on $x_3$.
$j_1$ is a telephone number of $j_2$.
$x_{1}$ is a quantity of foam/froth/suds of material $x_{2}$, with bubbles/vacuoles of material $x_{3}$.
$t_1$ talks on the phone to $t_2$ about $t_3$ in language $t_4$.
$x_{1}$ is a telephone transceiver/modem attached to system/network $x_{2}$.
$n_1$ is an answering machine/voice mail message about $n_2$ from $n_3$ to $n_4$.
$x_{1}$ is a fork/fork-type tool/utensil for purpose $x_{2}$ with tines/prongs $x_{3}$ on base/support $x_{4}$.
$x_1$ is a strawberry of species/breed $x_2$.
$x_1$ is an ash of species/variety $x_2$.
$x_1$ is a blackberry/raspberry/bramble of species $x_2$.
$x_1$ is a buckthorn of species/variety $x_2$.
$x_{1}$ reflects French/Gallic culture/nationality/language in aspect $x_{2}$.
$x_{1}$ reacts/responds/answers with action $x_{2}$ to stimulus $x_{3}$ under conditions $x_{4}$; $x_{1}$ is responsive.
valsi.notes: $x_3$ stimulates $x_1$ into reaction $x_2$, $x_3$ stimulates reaction $x_2$ (= {terfra} for place reordering); attempt to stimulate, prod (= {terfratoi}, {tunterfratoi}). See also {preti}, {danfu}, {spuda}, {cpedu}, {tarti}.

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ forgives $x_{2}$ for event/state/activity $x_{3}$.
$x_1$ is February in year $x_2$ on calendar $x_3$
$g_1$ (person/agent) fertilises $g_2=f_1$ for supporting the growth/development of $x_3=f_2$.
$x_{1}$ differs/is distinct from/contrasts with/is unlike $x_{2}$ in property/dimension/quantity $x_{3}$.
valsi.notes: Also other-than (less common meaning). See also {ranxi}, {drata}, {dunli}, {simsa}, {vrici}.

valsi.definition: $x_1$ makes $x_2$ undergo experience $x_3$; $x_1$ treats $x_2$ in manner $x_3$.
$x_{1}$ reflects African culture/nationality/geography in aspect $x_{2}$.
$f_1=t_1$ is Africa
$x_{1}$ (action) is easy/simple/facile for $x_{2}$ (agent) under conditions $x_{3}$; $x_{2}$ does $x_{1}$ freely/easily.
$x_{1}$ is a fraction, with numerator $x_{2}$, denominator $x_{3}$ ($x_{2}$/$x_{3}$).
$n_1$is a rational/fractional number.
$x_{1}$ offers/proffers $x_{2}$ [offering] to $x_{3}$ with conditions $x_{4}$.
valsi.notes: ($x_4$ may be nu canja, nu pleji, etc.; an unconditional offering has the 'condition' of acceptance); $x_2$ may be a specific object, a commodity (mass), an event, or a property; pedantically, for objects/commodities, this is sumti-raising from ownership of the object/commodity (= {posfriti}, posyselfriti for unambiguous {semantics}). See also {canja}, {dunda}, {rinsa}, {vecnu}, {jdima}, {cnemu}, {pleji}, {vitke}.

valsi.definition: $x_1$ is a bandersnatch of species $x_2$
$fru_1=fra_1$ frowns/grimaces at/in reaction to $fra_3$.
$x_{1}$ frowns/grimaces (facial expression).
valsi.notes: $x_1$ frowns/grimaces at/in reaction to $x_2$ (= {frufra}). See also {cmila}, {cisma}.

valsi.definition: sumti place tag: tag 5th sumti place.
reverse Polish mathematical expression (mex) operator flag.
discursive: luckily - not pertaining to luck - unluckily.
valsi.notes: Expresses fortune/misfortune of the speaker. Use {dai} to express fortune/misfortune of the listener. See also {funca}.

valsi.definition: begin indicator long scope.
begin within-context quote that need not be grammatical; terminated by fu'oi
$c_1$ blames/holds responsible/accuses $f_1$ for action/state $f_2$ from authority $f_3$ to audience $c_3$ with expression medium $c_4$.
attitudinal modifier: easy - difficult.
attitudinal modifier: easy - difficult.
$x_1=v_1=f_1$ is a loanword meaning $x_2=v_2$ in language $x_3=v_3$, based on word $x_4=f_2$ in language $x_5$.
end indicator long scope; terminates scope of all active indicators.
terminates scope started with fu'ei
n-ary mathematical operator: elliptical/unspecified mathematical expression (mex) operator.
$x_{1}$ is a copy/replica/duplicate/clone of $x_{2}$ in form/medium $x_{3}$ made by method $x_{4}$ (event).
$f_4=p_1$ pastes (during editing) $f_2=p_2$ from $f_3$.
$f_4=r_1$ copies (during editing) $f_2=r_2$ from $f_3$.
$c_1=s_2$ is a mockingbird of species $c_2$ which produces sound $s_1$ that is a copy of $f_2$.
$f_1=z_1=p_1$ holds the copyright for copying $f_2=p_2$ under law $p_3$.
valsi.notes:
"Copyright" itself might be "si'o fukzifypo'e".
If you are actually translating something with a copyright notice, you should leave the notice in the original language.

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ (passive) floats on/in fluid (gas/liquid) $x_{2}$; $x_{1}$ is buoyant.
$t_1=f_1$ is a raft of material $t_2$ shape $t_3$ floating on $f_2$.
$x_{1}$ (event/property) is determined by the luck/fortune of $x_{2}$; (note mabla/zabna not implied).
$j_1$ decides/makes a decision $j_2$ (du'u) about $j_3$, whose outcome is determined by luck.
$sa_1$ is fish sauce for use with $sa_2$, containing ingredients including $sa_3$.
$x_1$ is dandruff in/on $x_2$ caused by $x_3$.
$t_1=f_1$ is a quantity of/contains/is made of rust.
$x_{1}$ rots/decays/ferments with decay/fermentation agent $x_{2}$; $x_{1}$ is rotten/decayed/fermented.
$x_{1}$ is responsible/accountable for $x_{2}$ (action/resulting state) to judge/authority $x_{3}$.
$t_1=f1$ is a director/trustee on the board of directors/trustees of $f_2$.
$k_1=t_1=f_1$ is the board of directors/trustees of $k_3$.
letteral for f.
